function.name: if97_tsatp
function.description: Calculates saturated temperature [K] as a function of pressure, p [Pa].

function.name: if97_psatt
function.description: Calculates saturated pressure [Pa] as a function of temperature, T [K].

function.name: if97_tcrit
function.description: Returns the saturated temperature [K] at the critial point. A dummy parameter must be provided (e.g. 0).

function.name: if97_ttrip
function.description: Returns the saturated temperature [K] at the triple point. A dummy parameter must be provided (e.g. 0).

function.name: if97_pcrit
function.description: Calculates saturated pressure [Pa] at the critial point. A dummy parameter must be provided (e.g. 0).

function.name: if97_ptrip
function.description: Calculates saturated pressure [Pa] at the triple point. A dummy parameter must be provided (e.g. 0).

function.name: if97_t23
function.description: Calculates Temperature [K] along the Region 2/3 boundary as a function of pressure, p [Pa].

function.name: if97_p23
function.description: Calculates Pressure [Pa] along the Region 2/3 boundary as a function of temperature, T [K].

function.name: if97_vtp
function.description: Calculates the specific volume [m³/kg] as a function of T [K] and p [Pa].

function.name: if97_rhotp
function.description: Calculates the mass density [kg/m³] as a function of T [K] and p [Pa].

function.name: if97_htp
function.description: Calculates the mass enthalpy [J/kg] as a function of T [K] and p [Pa].

function.name: if97_utp
function.description: Calculates the mass internal energy [J/kg] as a function of T [K] and p [Pa].

function.name: if97_stp
function.description: Calculates the mass entropy [J/kg-K] as a function of T [K] and p [Pa].

function.name: if97_cptp
function.description: Calculates the isobaric specific heat [J/kg-K] as a function of T [K] and p [Pa].

function.name: if97_cvtp
function.description: Calculates the isochoric specific heat [J/kg-K] as a function of T [K] and p [Pa].

function.name: if97_wtp
function.description: Calculates the speed of sound [m/s] as a function of T [K] and p [Pa].

function.name: if97_vf
function.description: Calculates the saturated liquid specific volume [m³/kg] as a function of pressure, p [Pa].

function.name: if97_vg
function.description: Calculates the saturated vapor specific volume [m³/kg] as a function of pressure, p [Pa].

function.name: if97_rhof
function.description: Calculates the saturated liquid density [kg/m³] as a function of pressure, p [Pa].

function.name: if97_rhog
function.description: Calculates the saturated vapor density [kg/m³] as a function of pressure, p [Pa].

function.name: if97_hf
function.description: Calculates the saturated liquid enthalpy [J/kg] as a function of pressure, p [Pa].

function.name: if97_hg
function.description: Calculates the saturated vapor enthalpy [J/kg] as a function of pressure, p [Pa].

function.name: if97_uf
function.description: Calculates the saturated liquid internal energy [J/kg] as a function of pressure, p [Pa].

function.name: if97_ug
function.description: Calculates the saturated vapor internal energy [J/kg] as a function of pressure, p [Pa].

function.name: if97_sf
function.description: Calculates the saturated liquid entropy [J/kg-K] as a function of pressure, p [Pa].

function.name: if97_sg
function.description: Calculates the saturated vapor entropy [J/kg-K] as a function of pressure, p [Pa].

function.name: if97_cpf
function.description: Calculates the saturated liquid isobaric specific heat [J/kg-K] as a function of pressure, p [Pa].

function.name: if97_cpg
function.description: Calculates the saturated vapor isobaric specific heat [J/kg-K] as a function of pressure, p [Pa].

function.name: if97_cvf
function.description: Calculates the saturated liquid isochoric specific heat [J/kg-K] as a function of pressure, p [Pa].

function.name: if97_cvg
function.description: Calculates the saturated vapor isochoric specific heat [J/kg-K] as a function of pressure, p [Pa].

function.name: if97_wf
function.description: Calculates the saturated liquid speed of sound [m/s] as a function of pressure, p [Pa].

function.name: if97_wg
function.description: Calculates the saturated vapor speed of sound [m/s] as a function of pressure, p [Pa].

function.name: if97_mutp
function.description: Calculates the viscosity [Pa-s] as a function of T [K] and p [Pa].

function.name: if97_muf
function.description: Calculates the saturated liquid viscosity [Pa-s] as a function of pressure, p [Pa].

function.name: if97_mug
function.description: Calculates the saturated vapor viscosity [Pa-s] as a function of pressure, p [Pa].

function.name: if97_ktp
function.description: Calculates the thermal conductivity [W/m-K] as a function of T [K] and p [Pa].

function.name: if97_kf
function.description: Calculates the saturated liquid thermal conductivity [W/m-K] as a function of pressure, p [Pa].

function.name: if97_kg
function.description: Calculates the saturated vapor thermal conductivity [W/m-K] as a function of pressure, p [Pa].

function.name: if97_sigma
function.description: Calculates the surface tension [N/m] as a function of temperature, T [K].

function.name: if97_tph
function.description: Calculates the temperature, T [K], as a function of p [Pa] and mass enthalpy, h, [J/kg].

function.name: if97_tps
function.description: Calculates the temperature, T [K], as a function of p [Pa] and mass entropy, s, [J/kg-K].

function.name: if97_ths
function.description: Calculates the temperature, T [K], as a function of mass enthalpy, h [J/kg], and mass entropy, s [J/kg-K].

function.name: if97_phs
function.description: Calculates the pressure, p [Pa], as a function of mass enthalpy, h [J/kg], and mass entropy, s [J/kg-K].

function.name: if97_getvers
function.description: Returns the version of the IF97 implementation code. Takes a "dummy" parameter that can be (0).

function.name: if97_xph
function.description: Returns the steam quality, x, as a function of pressure, p [Pa], and mass enthalpy, h [J/kg].

function.name: if97_xps
function.description: Returns the steam quality, x, as a function of pressure, p [Pa], and mass entropy, s [J/kg-K].

function.name: if97_xpu
function.description: Returns the steam quality, x, as a function of pressure, p [Pa], and mass internal energy, u [J/kg].

function.name: if97_xpv
function.description: Returns the steam quality, x, as a function of pressure, p [Pa], and specific volume, v [m³/kg].

function.name: if97_xprho
function.description: Returns the steam quality, x, as a function of pressure, p [Pa], and mass density, rho [kg/m³].

function.name: if97_hpx
function.description: Returns the mass enthalpy, h [J/kg], as a function of pressure, p [Pa], and steam quality, x, within the vapor dome.

function.name: if97_spx
function.description: Returns the mass entropy, s [J/kg-K], as a function of pressure, p [Pa], and steam quality, x, within the vapor dome.

function.name: if97_upx
function.description: Returns the mass internal engergy, u [J/kg], as a function of pressure, p [Pa], and steam quality, x, within the vapor dome.

function.name: if97_vpx
function.description: Returns the specific volume, v [m³/kg], as a function of pressure, p [Pa], and steam quality, x, within the vapor dome.

function.name: if97_rhopx
function.description: Returns the mass density, rho [kg/m³], as a function of pressure, p [Pa], and steam quality, x, within the vapor dome.
